title: I hear myself during calls using headset
content:
I have Pixel 4 XL and Xiaomi ANC Type-C headset.
During calls (even during ringing state) i can loudly hear input from headset microphone, sometimes louder than my callee. This is happening using both SIMs (different carriers).
This is not happening:
during voip calls (e.g. Cisco Teams or Telegram)
using my old phone (OnePlus 3T) using same SIM card and same Google Phone app
Had anyone experienced this?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
